home.gettingStarted: Geting started with the e-Gate app

preOrder.intro: With Smart box e-Gate lets Online Shoppers received products which is Safe, Convenient and Exact by linked with e-Commerce Exchange likes Tiki, Shopee, Lazada.. All status of the delivery and receipt informations will updated to who owns the e-Gate app.
preOrder.des1: Buy, receive contactless goods with just one app on your phone
preOrder.title3: Receive goods via e-Gate Box, no need to meet the shipper
preOrder.content3: e-Gate Box represents the owner to transact with the Shipper, the goods are received Correctly - Safely pay directly to the beneficiary.
preOrder.content4: Don't want to answer the shipper's phone when you're busy? No rush, e-Gate only via text message
preOrder.content5: Actively choose the time to receive the goods, grant the right to unlock and pick up the goods for the recipient at all times
preOrder.content6: Pick up goods that have been disinfected according to the Covid prevention standards of the Ministry of Health.
preOrder.title7:
Become an e-Gate Box Owner
in the e-Gate ecosystem
preOrder.des7: Promote online shopping and payment, add value and customer experience, let e-Gate accompany you
preOrder.content8: The shipping unit is an important partner in the e-Gate's seamless operation, ensuring that the goods are delivered accurately and on time to the requested e-Gate Box.
preOrder.content9: e-Gate brings more superior options for customers, contributing to stimulating shopping, reaching many customers with special needs of e-commerce units.
preOrder.content10: Receive goods via e-Gate Box, no need to meet the shipper. Paying directly on the App creates a safe and convenient space for users.
preOrder.title11: Pre-order to experience the product as soon as possible
preOrder.content11: Many incentives for the first 272 customers to register as soon as possible
